Weekly report for Tuesday, May 30, 2001

    Hello Everyone.

    Leslie Ingham CPA will be here tomorrow at around 10am and will stay through the after noon. We will be working on getting the quick book receivables in tip top shape.

    The June statements, newsletters and financials have been sent to the printers for mailing. I have also included a notice/reminder to all the homeowners who did not pay last months assessments according to our records to pay now or risk collection.

    All seasons will be starting the carport repairs next week and the North side roofs July 1. Pacheco brothers will also be out next week to cut down the palm trees that are hitting the buildings. The June 7 walkthrough is awaiting his scheduling OK. Im sure its a go.

    Joe is finishing up the power washing of all of the complex including the dumpster areas and will be finished by Monday. He will then begin the touch up painting and dumpster gate projects.

    The plumber is currently working on the new hose bib project. The fire extinguishers are completed. The strip and wax of all main entries and elevator landings is in progress. All this combined with the daily monitoring of plumbing issues, the pintos, recycling monitoring, fielding the non stop phone and reprimanding homeowners for dumping appliances in the dumster areas.

    Humbly yours, Ld
